Simple patch

When the diagram is empty, there are no objects to reflect changes which causes this NPE. 

Similar to other update methods such as updateFontBold(), refresh on the GraphicalEditPart is redundant, as changes are reflected through commands, so removing this refresh call does not have any side effects.
